generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, bordered by curbs and buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.

- car: Several cars are visible, including a dark van in the middle of the road and a car partially visible on the right side.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a speed limit sign and directional signs.
- pole: Poles supporting traffic signs and lights are visible throughout the scene.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, including one on the right side of the image.
